1.Title: Booming Sound
1.Description: Launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases all squad members' ATK by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
